name: Letterswirl
summary: At last, a word game with splendor. Sit down with a friend and let Letterswirl’s mysterious vibe and unusual circular approach to spelling help you enjoy a meditative moment together. Or practice by yourself and see how you do on the global leaderboards. To really get into the flow, lose yourself in Timelapse mode, a circular word-search which will push your word-spotting abilities to the limits. As the clock accelerates, watch the stars turn above you and the skies blaze with electric fire.
